statements: DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Fraudulent Activity';
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 5 AND is_suspicious = TRUE;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01' AND activity_name LIKE '%fraud%';
DELETE FROM AlertLogs WHERE log_id = 5 AND activity_id = 10;
DELETE FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_description = 'Unauthorized access attempt' AND user_id = 25;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date < '2022-01-01' AND id IN (SELECT id FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%fraud%')
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id IN (SELECT activity_id FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 200);
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious Login'
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE alert_time < '2021-10-01' AND alert_type='Security Breach';
